# Bio
:::float-image

Jess is an evolutionary scientist based at Atlas of Living Australia, with a postdoc on species delimitation methods and PhD on diversification at micro/macro scales. She is also affiliated with the Division of Ecology and Evolution, ANU. Jess brings her experience in R to improve the readability, data standardisation and performance of EcoCommonsâ€™ platform ecological modelling algorithms. Jess is a strong advocate for diversity in STEMM.
